commits.message:
Merge pull request #1370 from eucalyptus/GUI-1611

GUI-1611: CloudWatch Charts - Instance Monitoring page
GUI-1611: Experimental branch that builds charts from an ng-repeat list
GUI-1611: Move large chart modal dialog to a reusable panel
GUI-1611: Use bytes instead of kB for disk read/write values; set proper label for enable/disable monitoring action on AWS
GUI-1611: Remove confirmation dialog when enabling/disabling monitoring.  Add flex-grow mixin to properly align enable/disable monitoring action.
GUI-1611: Remove reference to unused Chosen JS.  Restore 5 min as a granularity choice for 6-hour duration.
GUI-1611: Remove unused eucaOptionsArray utility method; move instance monitoring charts list constant to better location
GUI-1611: Match chart title/border styles with standard tile styles
GUI-1611: Refactor renderChart method and duration field styles for better reuse
GUI-1611: Refactor CloudWatch charts module/controller for better reuse
GUI-1611: Fix y-axis timestamp formatting issue.  Set zero baseline for NetworkIn chart.
GUI-1611: Explicitly set HTTP POST params from directive's local scope values to avoid circular reference issues on Chrome
GUI-1611: Add granularity options to large chart and adjust values based on selected duration;  restore eucaOptionsArray to set granularity options
GUI-1611: Use tal:repeat instead of ng-options to build duration and statistic choices for instance charts
GUI-1611: Adjust granularity to avoid exceeding 1,440 data points when long durations are set; add unit tests for granularity helper method
GUI-1611: Fix jshint complaint.  Add 'make ci' convenience cmd for local test runs
Merge branch 'master' into GUI-1611

Merge branch 'master' into GUI-1611

Conflicts:
	eucaconsole/templates/instances/instance_view.pt
	eucaconsole/templates/instances/instance_volumes.pt
GUI-1611: Move chart loading indicator to header to leverage standard FontAwesome spinner
GUI-1611: Wire up duration selection and refresh icon to chart redraw event in large chart dialog
GUI-1611: Refactor CloudWatch chart directive to follow Papa's Angular Style Guide
GUI-1611: Add CloudWatch charts for disk read/write bytes/ops. Convert layout to use Foundation's block grid.  Work around 500 error when session times out on instance monitoring page.
GUI-1611: Add inline link for enabling monitoring in disabled notice
GUI-1611: Add unit test for chart duration choices

Merge branch 'master' into GUI-1611

Conflicts:
	setup.py
GUI-1611: Allow duration drop-down to set time span for each chart; enable refresh and loading indicators; move styles to dedicated file

GUI-1611: Improve detection of detailed monitoring on AWS.  Sort time series data by timestamp since AWS doesn't seem to do the sorting.  Use better monitoring status label on instance detail page for AWS.
GUI-1611: Fix wobbly loading indicator when charts are loading/refreshing
GUI-1611: Build charts via ng-repeat to better support chart reordering down the road
GUI-1611: Add metric/title mapping to display friendly title for large chart dialog and reuse mapping for small chart titles; settle on value/label keys for monitoring duration ng-options array
GUI-1611: Initial progress displaying large charts

GUI-1611: More progress on CloudWatch charts for instances
- Simplified monitoring enabled/disabled condition in template
- Display notice instead of charts when monitoring is disabled
- Initial work on monitoring duration selection
- Add ordereddict dependency for Python 2.6
- Minor PEP8 cleanup of setup.py

Merge branch 'master' into GUI-1611

Conflicts:
	Gruntfile.js
	bower.json
	eucaconsole/static/js/thirdparty/magic-search/magic_search.scss
GUI-1611: Tighten spacing between duration label and selector
GUI-1611: Add loading indicator for large chart dialog
GUI-1611: Prevent multi-chart fetches in large chart dialog when the large chart is refreshed after more than one small chart is clicked.
GUI-1611: Allow statistic to be selected in large chart view; add eucaOptionsArray utility method for building consistent data structures for ng-options
GUI-1611: Refactor handling of ng-options choices for monitoring duration
GUI-1611: Allow instance monitoring to be updated on the instance detail page.
